docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 5.--Dr. Enrique Olaya Herrera, President-elect of Colombia, who has been here as the guest of the government, concluded his official program today and left for Chicago. Later he will go to New York before sailing for Colombia to...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 5.--Dr. Enrique Olaya Herrera, President-elect of Colombia, who has been here as the guest of the government, concluded his official program today and left for Chicago. Later he will go to New York before sailing for Colombia to assume office.
docs.abstract: Concludes official program in Wash; leaves for Chicago; work praised by Stimson

headline.main: OLAYA IS HONORED AS HIS VISIT ENDS; He Is Guest at Farewell Luncheon by Colleagues of PanAmerican Union Board.STIMSON PRAISES WORK Colombia President-Elect LeavesWashington for Chicago andWill Sail Soon for Home. Stimson Lauds Service. Olaya Praises Union Director.

docs.snippet: The International Telephone and Telegraph Corporation will celebrate its tenth anniversary on June 16. During the ten years the company has grown from a holding company for the Porto Rico Telephone Company and the Cuban Telephone Company ...
